A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best cinematic qualities of all Star Wars films. Story lines were weakest of any SW film. The character development  was very weak and unconvincing. The actors and actresses were excellent but the chemistry between each was in my opinion worse than the original trilogy but much better than the prequels. This should have been a standalone movie and separate from any particular trilogy or saga. Did not have the feel of a Star Wars movie.  Sad. Wasted the character of Luke. I'm not mad because of his death but rather the poor story arc leading to this event. It should have been developed more and happened in the episode 9.
